snippet.title: Safety, Quality, Schedule: the motto of LS1 Sécurité, qualité, calendrier : les mots d’ordre du LS1
snippet.description: Safety, Quality, Schedule: the motto of LS1 Sécurité, qualité, calendrier : les mots d’ordre du LS1 / The LHC’s first long shutdown, LS1, is a marathon that began on 16 February and will take us through to the beginning of 2015. Just as Olympic marathon runners have a motto, Citius, Altius, Fortius, so the athletes of LS1 work to the mantra of Safety, Quality, Schedule [...] BUL-NA-2013-145.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 27/2013 28/2013

snippet.title:
A word from Lyn Evans:
A sprint to the finish Un mot de Lyn Evans :
Le sprint final
snippet.description:
A word from Lyn Evans:
A sprint to the finish Un mot de Lyn Evans :
Le sprint final / Most people consider that the starting point for the LHC was a meeting organised by the European Committee for Future Accelerators in Lausanne in March 1984, even though quite a few of us at CERN had already begun work on the design in 1981. Since that time this truly unique machine has moved from a dream to a reality [...] BUL-NA-2008-102; 32/2008; 33/2008; 34/2008.- 2008 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 32/2008 33/2008 34/2008
